post:
plugpost.com is a venture of Greentree Technologies. Greentree Technologies is providing IT products and services since 2010. Greentree Technologies recently diversified into Hosted applications and VPS.

plugnpost.com offers premium mail box service to Individuals and Business

<strong>Plans:</strong>

<strong>Smart:</strong> A Monthly Plan with name@plugnpost,com mail-id. Price: $ 1.0 / month

<strong>Brilliant:</strong> A Yearly Plan with name@plugnpost,com mail-id. Price: $ 10.0 / year (savings of $ 2.0)

<strong>Professional</strong>: A Yearly Plan with name@your-own-domain-name mail-d. Price: $ 15.0 / Year.

All plans include 2000 MB storage, 10 MB Attachments, Virus scanning and Spam guard.

Web mail, Group calendar, global address books, Sharing and collaboration are some of the standard features.

We also have business plan choices from shared to dedicated VPS based.

For details, Demo and sign-up visit: <a href="http://www.plugnpost.com" target="_blank">www.plugnpost.com</a>

FAQs:

Server Location: Online.net, France and Quadix, USA

Servers: Xeon E3 1230v2 , Hardware Raid-1

Dual Xeon 5650 , Harware Raid -10

Mail software: Powered by Zimbra

( This offer is admin authorized. I have sanction from @Sprit  for posting this offer)
